title: paradEvi nI pAdamulE
sahitya:
paradEvi nI pAdamulE naeranammiti


anupallavi

  varamau shrI Adipuri nivAsini tripurasundari


caraNam 1    madagaja gamanI amba mahiSAsura damanI madana janaka sahOdari mAhEshvari gauri
    caraNam 2    alikula vENi ambujapANi kalavaramulu dIrcci brOvu kAmita phaladAyaki
    caraNam 3    pApa vidAri pAvani kaumAri gOpAbAla shrI vENugOpAladAsa janani
